name: Luca's Kitchen & Bakery
description: An independent bakery and kitchen.  We stock flour, yeast, eggs, milk, butter, passata, dry pasta, rice, tea boxes, coffee (beans or ground), and sourdough starter. Minimum order for delivery Â£25 - deliveries before 3pm will be delivered the following day, within a 3 mile radius. Orders can only be made by Facebook Messenger - include your full address and phone number, and they will call you back and take payment over the phone.
address: 35 North Cross Road, East Dulwich SE22 9ET
safetyTips: Please get in contact with this supplier to find out safety measures they are taking.
